data.comment: The match is underway at Benito Villamarin.
Betis to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
In the minute 1, Free kick Betis.
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Seville.
Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Cadiz at Benito Villamarin.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
In the minute 6, In Seville Betis attack through Antonio Sanabria. The finish is off target, however.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Betis.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Betis throw-in in Cadiz's half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Cadiz.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Salvi Sanchez hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Cadiz in Seville.
Throw-in for Cadiz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Cadiz needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 24, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Betis a goal kick.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cadiz push upfield but Antonio Mateu Lahoz quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 28, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 31, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Throw-in for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 34, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Cadiz will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Betis.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Filip Malbasic (Cadiz) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Betis.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seville.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
In the minute 40, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Cadiz throw-in in Betis's half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a throw-in for Cadiz, close to Betis's area.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Cadiz advance rapidly upfield but Antonio Mateu Lahoz blows for offside.
Can Betis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 45, Antonio Mateu Lahoz blows to end the first-half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz has blown to start the second-half.
Can Betis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
In the minute 47, Betis have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Nabil Fekir for Betis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 50, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Cadiz a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cadiz at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 52, Anthony Lozano is replacing Filip Malbasic for Cadiz at Benito Villamarin.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Cadiz at Benito Villamarin.
Throw-in for Betis in the half of Cadiz.
In the minute 55, Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Betis drive upfield and Martin Montoya gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cadiz defender.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Betis to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
In the minute 58, Antonio Sanabria for Betis has been booked by Antonio Mateu Lahoz and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 59, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Nabil Fekir (Betis) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Betis.
In the minute 63, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Betis throw-in in Cadiz's half.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Diego Lainez is replacing Aitor Ruibal for the home team.
In the minute 65, Fali is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Alex is on a sub for Alberto Perea for Cadiz.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 67, Cadiz's Fali looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Alvaro Cervera is making the team's third substitution at Benito Villamarin with Garrido replacing Fali.
Cadiz make their fourth substitution with Jairo Izquierdo replacing Salvi Sanchez.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Betis.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Throw-in Cadiz.
In the minute 70, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Goal! Guido Rodriguez gives Betis a 1-0 lead in Seville.
Diego Lainez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 73, Cadiz to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
Cadiz have a dangerous throw-in.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Joaquin with Cristian Tello.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Betis in the half of Cadiz.
Betis to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Cadiz pushes forward through Anthony Lozano, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cadiz push forward at Benito Villamarin and Alvaro Negredo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Betis defence.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
In the minute 82, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Antonio Sanabria with Loren Moron. This is the third substitution made today by Manuel Pellegrini.
Betis drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Betis.
In the minute 88, At Benito Villamarin, Betis are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Betis are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex (Cadiz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
At Benito Villamarin the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Cadiz throw-in in Betis's half.
Throw-in for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Betis.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in Seville. The final score is 1-0.
